name: Garbage Truck Driving parking 3d simulator Game
name_original: Garbage Truck Driving parking 3d simulator Game
description:
Garbage Truck

Get to experience this awesome garbage truck simulator game.
Get to feel like a real trucker who is driving a big scrap truck. Being a real trucker and driving a big trash flatcar you have a big
responsibility to keep the big city clean & healthy.

Driving around in regular city cars or other small vehicles is easier than driving around in this big rubbish gondola.
Sit behind the steering wheel of stinky gondola & realistic garbage flatcar on city streets by rubbish transporting the trash in challenging
20 driver levels.

Your mission is to clean the scruff from town. Once you collected all garbage with road sweeper / stinky flatcar drive your dump

gondola to dispose of all the trash in junkyard with road sweeper.
Done with a lot driver parking, rubbish transporter, oil tanker ; road sweeper games that offers you just to park your Filth vehicle. This
game is unique with challenging driver mission. Pick up scrap from streets, you will love realistic hauler animation for collecting rubbish
and disposing off in recycling plant.

This parking game is perfect for people that like to drive big vehicle's and like to have nice fresh and clean streets. and its also a nice
road trip you will see alote of things while you are on the job.and a good training for street parking.
Download rubbish road sweeper this wonderful in your iPad tablet and phone for unlimited fun for youngsters.

Key features:

20 real big city 3d game levels
Limited time to pick up the garbage drive the garbage
Real life driving and parking experience
Amazingly HD realistic graphics with superb background music
Show your best extreme truck driving skills
